stripped_text: Whenever an encounter with this ice ends, if it has 3 or more hosted virus counters, purge virus counters and derez this ice. Subroutine Place 1 virus counter on this ice. Subroutine Look at the top 4 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. Subroutine End the run.
text:
Whenever an encounter with this ice ends, if it has 3 or more hosted virus counters, purge virus counters and derez this ice.
[subroutine] Place 1 virus counter on this ice.
[subroutine] Look at the top 4 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
[subroutine] End the run.
title: Knowledge Seeker
